1: Andrew Robb and David McIlwaine killings
3:
--------------------
Text: Andrew Robb and David McIlwaine killings:  It later emerged in court hearings that Robb had made disparaging remarks about the killing of UVF Mid-Ulster Brigade leader Richard Jameson by an LVF gunman the previous month.
Triplets:<Andrew Robb
4:
--------------------
Text: Andrew Robb and David McIlwaine killings:  This had angered the killers, themselves members of the Mid-Ulster UVF, and in retaliation they had lured the two men to the remote lane on the outskirts of town, where they killed and mutilated them.
